document.full_text: u.s. regulators should press ahead with approving construction licenses for new nuclear power plants despite japan's nuclear crisis, president barack obama's top energy official said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. energy chief: don't delay new nuclear plants
lines_and_colors: u.s. regulators should press ahead with approving construction licenses for new nuclear power plants despite japan's nuclear crisis, president barack obama's top energy official said on tuesday.
